developer: I have years of experience in topics from object oriented programming to artificial intelligence. Pretty much everything interests me, including web development and machine learning. Coding brings me joy, so in addition to quality projects, I only lose minimal sanity along the way.
mentor: Helping others is important to me. In addition to official mentoring, I often teach classmates! Whether it be computer science, calculus, physics, or any other tough subject, I'm always willing to lend a hand if you're struggling with something.
artist: Though STEM is my main jig, I'm also a musician and performer. I have a creative side and an eye for design, which can often inspire me when stuck on one of those dreadful CP problems. It's also an outlet for me to stay balanced and well-rounded.
